question: Some people say that modern innovations bring a lot more problems than benefits? Do you agree?
text: It is considered that some people believe the new advanced development of technology  had given both to varieties of commodities, product equipments and so on has a plethora of problem than its merits. This essay will disagree with this trend because new modernization makes the individual's activity easy and comfortable and its demerits can be eliminated if used properly by everyone.

To commence with, these days people growth has become developed and convenient due to the new invention of products or commodities  or gadgets. Due to this individual are being able to talk from one  place to another living far apart. For instance, developed by internet, computer, mobile has confer opportunities for the people to practice video call or audio call to talk with their beloved one who are near and dear to them. Also, assisting to make good relation with the people of different company of varied cultures and tradition. Moreover, the people work is becoming easier because of service of equipment like washing machine for washing clothes, gas for cooking, freeze for cooking foodstuff and so on. In addition, because of modernization people are being able to travel from one place to another without any trivial like aeroplanes, ship, bus, train are the means of transport bestowing everyone easy soul style. That's why, there is no doubt that new modernization has proffer person's life  happy, easy and comfortable.

Despite of this merits, it's also had some demerits due to the people think it's has more problem with one activity. The main reason is because of the imbalance operation of the developed product. For example, people are using the internet and gadgets every time, so they are becoming addicted and affecting their own health status. Furthermore, people might think that because the world is suffering from war due to use of advance developed equipment such as acid, bomb, gun and so on. However, in my opinion, if the individual practice it properly. Hence, it can be helped in making the person's lifestyle  ease and joy.
To sum up, even some people believe new modernization has become issues in growth, in my opinion, it's very useful and priceless if everyone understands its values and benefit for good things.
